text:
Tigerspike | Full stack Android Tech Lead| FULL TIME | Singapore/ Vietnam | https://tigerspike.com/

Tigerspike a growing Digital Products company with 10 offices around the world (including London, NY, Dubai & Sydney). We work across a range of industries on consumer & enterprise apps with clients such as Emirates, 7Eleven, The UN & Westfield. Our mission is to 'Improve people's lives through technology'.

We're looking for someone to work on a brand new client/ project based in Ho Chi Minh for at least the first 6 months and then be based in Singapore for new projects.

Take a look at the role for more details: http://bit.ly/2wHcg1Z or drop me an email: michelle.coulson@tigerspike.com
